patterns: Give me the status of my delivery.
where can I track my delivery
I want to track my parcel
I want to track my order
give me the shipping date of my parcel
give me the shipping date of your order
I want to track my delivery
track my parcel with sending number XY
answers: You can check the current status of your parcel delivery under "My Deliveries" with your parcel number.
The exact shipping date can be seen under "My Deliveries"

patterns: What branch is closest to me?
What services are offered in my branch?
What services do you offer at the location?
Is the branch open on saturday?
Is the post location in bern open on sundays?
Is the location openend on weekends?
answers: All the locations and services from Swiss Post can be found on a map in the online search.
The locations and services of every branch can be checked on our online location search.

patterns: Where do I change my personal data?
I want to change my name
I want to adjust my profile
I want to update my telephone number
I want to update my profile
answers: You can change your personal data on your profile.
All your data can be changed on your personal profile.
